document.title: Removing a cluster
document.paragraph:
To remove clusters, you can:
../20_browsing/20_viewing_information_about_a_component/10_centering_tools_on_a_component.xml Center the editor on the component , and click
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_delete_color.gif in the
../../reference/05_general_interface_description/30_main_toolbars.xml standard toolbar or select Remove current item in the Tools menu.
../../reference/05_general_interface_description/10_general_interface_mechanisms/10_pick_and_drop.xml Drop a pebble of this component on
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_delete_color.gif in the
../../reference/05_general_interface_description/30_main_toolbars.xml standard toolbar or in the
../../reference/50_diagram_tool/00_introduction.xml Diagram tool
../../reference/50_diagram_tool/20_toolbar.xml toolbar .
Use the cluster tab in the project configuration window.
See also
